1.content:
"Tsuini!!!" Tomomi, Scandal's bassist fell into her huge grey sofa.
Her small and skinny body disappeared between the huge cushion and her large clothes. Seemed like someone forgot it's clothes on the couch.
Tomomi, or Timo (for Tiny Tomo) as her friends loved to call her, just came back from a grueling world tour with her band Scandal and all this traveling, running, playing and singing in front of a different country for six months took its toll on her body.
Her usually skinny body got even smaller and leaner, she was always tired and felt like sleeping when she was in a band meeting.
But the tiredness was worth it, as they just celebrated the 10th anniversary of the band, and had the most heart warming welcome in their home country.
She stood there for an hour, not moving, looking at the wall in front of her, lost inside her clothes.

-- -- --

After a long time, she finally decided to reach her phone to order some food.
She was famished, she ordered her usual meal and added some extras.
Timo was so tired that she ordered on the first restaurant that came, and passed out, waiting for the delivery man to come.

---- ---- -----

The door bell rang.
Tomo jumped from her sleep, and emerged from her clothes.
She stumbled her way to the door and opened it.
"Ogawa-san? Asked the delivery guy.
- Hai!
- Here's your food miss.
The guy hands her three huge black bags with a light red logo that showed a sumo enjoying a Ramen, it said Fat Sumo.
- Wait, did I really order all that?
The guy check his note :" A huge Tonkotsu Ramen, with extras noodles, a can of beer and extra fried donuts.
- Fried Donuts?
- That's a bonus from the restaurant for the new customers. FFD *Free Fried Donuts*
- Okay! Arrigato anyway.
- Arrigato, and bon appetit."
As she closed the door with her foot, he arms full of bags, the smell of the FFD crossed her nose. Her eyes opened wide, she never smell something like that before.
She put the bag on a table, and got a bite of that wonderful donuts, and what a donuts.
1.title: A New Taste

choices: Tomo comes back later that day
13.content:
"Ohayo!" A familiar high pitched voice could be heard in the entrance of the new restaurant.
It looked like like every fast food restaurant from all over the world.
Signs were showing the dishes served at that time. It was all mostly about greasy, fattening food.
"Daijobu desuka?" Ask the brunette that just entered the shop to one of the worker.
"Irrashaimasse ! Daijobu, answer the young man, what's your order?"
As the young man lifted his eyes from the screen in front him, he was presented to a cute smile, highlighted by chubby chipmunk cheeks, pretty black eyes, mostly covered by dark long hair.
" I ordered some food from your restaurant yesterday, and it was so good that I wanted to taste it again to see if I wasn't going mad. Those donuts were insane! This was the best thing I've ever eaten."
"So what's your order then?
-I'll have the same thing as yesterday, and a bonus. Meaning the tonketsu
- Normal, Extra or Double?
- Double? Really? Let's go for it!
I'll also have the can of beer, and as a dessert I'll take a box of your fried donuts!
-What size for your box?
-The Normal One... Euh no.... The Biggest one!
- the XXL is 24 donuts!
- Yeah, let's go for it!!
- Alright, so the extra large donuts, the double tonketsu and the beer. Do you want the free FFD with it?
-Free is always a yes!
-Okay, It'll be ready soon, please wait a few minutes. "

As the young finished to take the order, at first he was surprised that such a small lady could eat all that fattening food. But when he took a second glance at her, he noticed that she was a tad curvier than expected.
Last night meal already took it's toll on Tomomi's body.
Her body was no longer a skinny bone. She developed an ass, something she never truly had before but that clearly appeared to the eye right now. When she turned to the side, looking at her phone, you could a roll of fat has formed and a belly was starting to show where it used to be so flat. Her chubby face even had the beginning of a double chin.

Few minutes later, the man give her 5 black bags.
"There you go miss, arrigato gozaimasu, sayonara !
-Arrigato."
